fields.default:
Terms and Conditions:

  1. This internship is for learning and development purposes
  2. The intern agrees to maintain confidentiality of company information
  3. Regular attendance and punctuality are expected
  4. The intern will follow company policies and guidelines
  5. Performance will be evaluated periodically
  6. Either party can terminate the internship with 1 week notice
  7. No permanent employment is guaranteed upon completion
